summary: SPD covariance-geodesic change scores S_SPD

summary: Geodesic-weighted temporal SSC regularization
notes: SSC codes across time regularized using geodesic affinities (w_ij = exp(-d_G(i,j)^2/Ïƒ^2)); divergence treated as change cue; provenance: THISCHAT-GEO-005

summary: Geodesic vs projection vs SPD ablations

summary: Geodesic Flow Kernel (GFK) for pre/post domain shift
